mapper.select: select ph.id, ph.polla_name, ph.start_date, ph.end_date, ph.total_bet, ph.image, pb.id, pb.local_bet_score, pb.visitor_bet_score, pb.result_bet, pb.status, pp.id, pp.position, pp.num_wildcards_left, pp.total, pp.earnings, u.user_id, ma.id as match_id from matchs as ma, polla_matches as pm, polla_headers as ph, polla_bets as pb, polla_participants as pp, users as u where ma.id = pm.match_id and pm.polla_header_id = ph.id and pb.polla_participant_id = pp.id and pb.polla_match_id = pm.id and u.user_id = pp.user_id and pm.match_id= #{matchId} and pp.user_id = #{userId};
mapper.update: UPDATE polla_bets SET local_bet_score = #{localBetScore}, visitor_bet_score = #{visitorBetScore}, updated_date = now(), status = #{status}, result_bet = #{resultBet}, flg_wildcard = #{flagWildcard} WHERE id = #{idBet}
mapper.select: SELECT pb.id AS polla_bet_id, pb.polla_match_id AS polla_bet_match_id, pb.polla_participant_id AS polla_bet_participant_id, pb.local_bet_score AS polla_bet_local_score, pb.visitor_bet_score AS polla_bet_visitor_score, pb.result_bet AS polla_bet_result, pb.updated_date AS polla_bet_updated_date, pb.points AS polla_bet_points, pb.status AS polla_bet_status, pb.flg_wildcard, pm.id AS polla_match_id, pm.polla_header_id AS polla_match_header_id, pm.match_id AS polla_match_match_id, m.id AS match_id, m.match_code, m.match_date, m.match_place, m.result_match, m.local_score, m.visitor_score, m.status AS match_status, m.local_team_id, tl.team_name AS local_team_name, tl.image AS image_local, m.visitor_team_id, tv.team_name AS visitor_team_name, tv.image AS image_visitor, ph.mode_wildcard_flg FROM polla_bets AS pb, polla_matches AS pm, matchs AS m, teams AS tl, teams AS tv, polla_headers ph WHERE pb.polla_match_id = pm.id AND pm.match_id = m.id AND m.local_team_id = tl.id AND m.visitor_team_id = tv.id AND pm.polla_header_id = ph.id AND polla_participant_id = #{pollaParticipantId} order by m.match_date desc;
